Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya En Dhevane, Ummai Uyarththi, Ummudaiya Naamaththai Eppozhudhum Endrendraikkum Sthoththirippen.
2 naadorum Ummai Sthoththiriththu, Eppozhudhum Endrendraikkum Ummudaiya Naamaththaith Thudhippen.
3 karththar Periyavarum Migavum Pugazhappadaththakkavarumaayirukkiraar; Avarudaiya Magaththuvam Aaraaindhumudiyaadhu.
4 thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Ummudaiya Kiriyaigalin Pugazhchchiyaich Solli, Ummudaiya Vallamaiyulla Seygaigalai Arivippaargal.
5 ummudaiya Sirandha Magimaip Piradhaabaththaiyum, Ummudaiya Adhisayamaana Kiriyaigalaiyunguriththup Pesuven.
6 janangal Ummudaiya Bayangaramaana Kiriyaigalin Vallamaiyaich Solluvaargal; Ummudaiya Magaththuvaththai Naan Vivarippen.
7 avargal Umadhu Migundha Dhayavai Ninaiththu Velippaduththi, Umadhu Needhiyaik Gembeeriththup Paaduvaargal.
8 karththar Irakkamum Manaurukkamum, Neediya Saandhamum Migundha Kirubaiyum Ullavar.
9 karththar Ellaarmelum Dhayavullavar; Avar Irakkangal Avarudaiya Ellaak Kiriyaigalinmelumulladhu.
10 karththaave, Ummudaiya Kiriyaigalellaam Ummaith Thudhikkum; Ummudaiya Parisuththavaangal Ummai Sthoththirippaargal.
11 manupuththirarukku Umadhu Vallamaiyulla Seygaigalaiyum, Umadhu Raajyaththin Sirandha Magimaippiradhaabaththaiyum Therivikkumpadikku;
12 umadhu Raajyaththin Magimaiyai Ariviththu, Umadhu Vallamaiyaikkuriththup Pesuvaargal.
13 ummudaiya Raajyam Sadhaagaalangalilumulla Raajyam, Ummudaiya Aalugai Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaagavum Ulladhu.
14 karththar Vizhugira Yaavaraiyum Thaangi, Madangadikkappatta Yaavaraiyum Thookkividugiraar.
15 ellaa Jeevangalin Kangalum Ummai Nokkikkondirukkiradhu; Etra Velaiyile Neer Avaigalukku Aagaarankodukkireer.
16 neer Umadhu Kaiyaith Thirandhu, Sagala Piraanigalin Vaanjaiyaiyum Thirupthiyaakkugireer.
17 karththar Thamadhu Vazhigalilellaam Needhiyullavarum, Thamadhu Kiriyaigalilellaam Kirubaiyullavarumaayirukkiraar.
18 thammai Nokkik Kooppidugira Yaavarukkum, Unmaiyaaith Thammai Nokkik Kooppidugira Yaavarukkum, Karththar Sameebamaayirukkiraar.
19 avar Thamakkup Bayandhavargaludaiya Viruppaththinpadi Seydhu, Avargal Kooppidudhalaik Kettu, Avargalai Ratchikkiraar.
20 karththar Thammil Anbukoorugira Yaavaraiyum Kaappaatri, Dhunmaarkkar Yaavaraiyum Azhippaar.
21 en Vaai Karththarin Thudhiyaich Solvadhaaga; Maamsadhegamulla Yaavum Avarudaiya Parisuththa Naamaththai Eppozhudhum Endrendraikkum Sthoththirikkakkadavadhu.
